data.text: @JOSalinger @Leecard0 @gumboqueen3030 Glad to here it. I had 1 cortisone shot in the bad knee and foot about a dozen years ago. Worked wonders. Restored my gate and help to get walking normally again
@JoelDoyle623 @Leecard0 @gumboqueen3030 I had osteo in a hip and knee, hip was worse. Got a new hip, and over time, knee has done so much better.
@gumboqueen3030 Have you had lab work for autoimmune muscle disorders?
@mwjeepster1 @pfair143 I'm anemic and my thyroid is messed up , got new meds today ! But he was impressed with the great ideas y'all had !

@gumboqueen3030 The journey to recapture muscle mass and strength post illness is daunting but please donâ€™t give up. I currently am facing the same issue. Eat WELL, and take small steps to build up muscle (short walks). 😘
@pfair143 @gumboqueen3030 Agree.  Red meat, lots of animal fat and high fat dairy.
@gumboqueen3030 Protein as in real meat-not the fake stuff- plus weight bearing exercise. You do not need a gym. Boost ingredients are garbage.
@gumboqueen3030 good luck, sorry you are going through that ..
@gumboqueen3030 If you are on FB there are some good (big) Long Covid support groups where people share information. Maybe your doc can help you get in a study?
